ResearchProjectDef.label: basic traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Design basic traps from available materials. Whilst unlikely to stop a major offensive, these security measures should be effective against wild animals and stray humanoids.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Now that we are here to stay, we must focus on designing more effective traps to defend ourselves. Advanced Spike Traps seem like a good start.

ResearchProjectDef.label: poison traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: The local flora and fauna are fascinating. What if we could extract substances they produce and use them for our benefit? Mixed with certain additives, they would make for a great addition to our trap collection.

ResearchProjectDef.label: gas traps
ResearchProjectDef.description: What if we could use the poisons we currently produce and spread them over a large area? With such marvels, our enemies will have a choice to either stay away or be destroyed!
